page.title: 13STEWARTON AT PLAY
page.content: The many well kept gardens in Stewarton point to the fact that people enjoy gardening in their spare time. There are 2 Girl Guide Companies a Ranger Unit and 3 Brownie Packs for girls as well as Girl's Brigade. For boys there is the Boy's Brigade, 2 Cub Scout packs and the Boy Scout troop.Keep-fit classes are popular with adults and creative and highland dancing classes for young people. Boys enjoy football with the Annick Youth Club and young men play for the Thistle and Amateur Clubs. There is also a Ladies Football team. The Do-It-Yourself store in Rigg Street is always busy as many enjoy doing work about the house and garden as hobbies. The 747 Snooker Club in New Steet is popular with men and the Bowling Club and Tennis courts are very popular. Many charities are supported.
